articles.title: Larne: Man speaks of fear during rioting at NI leisure centre
articles.description: Masked youths attacked a leisure centre and set it on fire as violence spread to other towns in Northern Ireland.
articles.content:

Ballymena

articles.title: Fredi Rivero: Three teenage girls admit manslaughter of man, 75
articles.description: Fredi Rivero, 75, was pushed, shoved, kicked and punched in a group attack in north London.
articles.content:
Three teenage girls have pleaded guilty at the Old Bailey to the manslaughter of a 75-year-old man who died after a street attack that was filmed on a mobile phone.

articles.title: What we know so far after Air India flight from Ahmedabad to London Gatwick crashes
articles.description: More than 200 people were on board the flight to London Gatwick when it crashed shortly after take-off.
articles.content:
The passenger plane crashed on departure from Ahmedabad.
According to flight tracking website FlightRadar24, the signal from the aircraft was lost "less than a minute after take-off".
